```{r}
library(GOFEmpirical)
```


## Histogram of p-value
## AD, Exponential
```{r}
check.AD.exp = function(par,n,m){
  out <- matrix(0,m,1)
  pval <- matrix(0,m,1)
  for(i in 1:m){
    x=rexp(n,par[1])
    out[i,]=AD.exp(x)
    pval[i,]=AD.exp.pvalue(out[i,])$P
  }
  hist(out,main="AD statistics for Exponnetial random sample")
  abline(v=mean(out), col="red")
  hist(pval,main="p value of AD")
  abline(v=mean(pval), col="red")
}
system.time(check.AD.exp(c(2),400,100))
```


## Histogram of p-value
## CvM, Exponential
```{r}
check.CvM.exp = function(par,n,m){
  out <- matrix(0,m,1)
  pval <- matrix(0,m,1)
  for(i in 1:m){
    x=rexp(n,par[1])
    out[i,]=CvM.exp(x)
    pval[i,]=CvM.exp.pvalue(out[i,])$P
  }
  hist(out,main="CvM statistics for Exponential random sample")
  abline(v=mean(out), col="red")
  hist(pval,main="p value of CvM")
  abline(v=mean(pval), col="red")
}
system.time(check.CvM.exp(c(2),400,100))
```
